{}
---
const a   =   `Hello world`;
b(`hi ${ name } there`)

c(`what
is
${word}?`)

d(`what
is
${


    word
}?`  );

e(`what
is
${
        word
    /*whatever*/}?`  );
---
const a = `Hello world`;
b(`hi ${name} there`);

c(`what
is
${word}?`);

d(`what
is
${

    word
}?`);

e(`what
is
${
    word
/*whatever*/}?`);
